theRetrospect:DoubleTime.NAME: Double Time
theRetrospect:DoubleTime.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Trigger a timeline once and theretrospect:collapse it.

theRetrospect:Overcore.NAME: Overcore
theRetrospect:Overcore.DESCRIPTION: {@@}theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s} and be theretrospect:Frozen for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}.{!Upgrades!|0= NL Exhaust.}

theRetrospect:Avert.NAME: Avert
theRetrospect:Avert.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Play a random attack card from your discard pile, then theretrospect:construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
theRetrospect:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. Gain energy equal to the {!M!|@=card's|>1=cards' total} cost.

theRetrospect:Concurrency.NAME: Concurrency
theRetrospect:Concurrency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each timeline you have.

theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.NAME: Tap the Future
theRetrospect:TapTheFuture.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain {!Upgrades!|@=[E] [E] [E]|0=[E] [E]}. NL Shuffle an *Empty to your draw pile.

theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
theRetrospect:SleightOfHand.DESCRIPTION: theretrospect:Paradoxical. NL Deal !D! damage. Replay your last card this turn.

theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.NAME: Alternative Reality
theRetrospect:AlternativeReality.DESCRIPTION: {@@}If you have an odd number of cards in your draw pile, gain !B! Block. Otherwise, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
theRetrospect:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: For each timeline you have, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.NAME: Charge Rifle
theRetrospect:ChargeRifle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Increase the damage of ALL Charge Rifle cards by !M! this combat.

theRetrospect:DejaVu.NAME: Déjà vu
theRetrospect:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Permanently increase ALL Déjà vu's Block by !M!. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.NAME: Rewrite History
theRetrospect:RewriteHistory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your discard pile. Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theRetrospect:ShadowForm.NAME: Shadow Form
theRetrospect:ShadowForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card{!M!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.NAME: Unstable Chronology
theRetrospect:UnstableChronology.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Cost 1 less [E] for each time you take damage in this combat. theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:Paradox.NAME: Paradox
theRetrospect:Paradox.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. theretrospect:Delusional. NL You cannot play any cards when your hand is full.

theRetrospect:TimeLoop.NAME: Time Loop
theRetrospect:TimeLoop.DESCRIPTION: Apply to a timeline. Cards played by this timeline return to the timeline instead of exhausting.

theRetrospect:Shortcut.NAME: Shortcut
theRetrospect:Shortcut.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=Innate. NL |0=}Timelines require !M!% less HP to construct.

theRetrospect:LightspeedLeap.NAME: Lightspeed Leap
theRetrospect:LightspeedLeap.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Only playable if you have played at least !M! card{!M!|>1=s} this turn. theretrospect:Construct !theRetrospect:TimelineCount! timeline{!theRetrospect:TimelineCount!|>1=s}.

theRetrospect:WarmUp.NAME: Warm Up
theRetrospect:WarmUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Dexterity next turn.

theRetrospect:Telekinesis.NAME: Telekinesis
theRetrospect:Telekinesis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage ignoring the enemy's Block.

theRetrospect:Recollection.NAME: Recollection
theRetrospect:Recollection.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Copy !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your discard pile into your hand. {!M!|@=It costs|>1=They cost} 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a Card to Copy into Your Hand.
Cards to Copy into Your Hand.

theRetrospect:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theRetrospect:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}For every !M! card{!M!|>1=s} in your draw pile, deal !D! damage.

theRetrospect:HatTrick.NAME: Hat Trick
theRetrospect:HatTrick.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Put !M! card{!M!|>1=s} from your draw pile into your hand.

theRetrospect:BlindStrike.NAME: Blind Strike
theRetrospect:BlindStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Shuffle a *Dazed into your draw pile.

theRetrospect:Evanescence.NAME: Evanescence
theRetrospect:Evanescence.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|@=Innate. NL |0=}At the start of your turn, discard all Status cards in your hand.

theRetrospect:SoullessDemon.NAME: Soulless Demon
theRetrospect:SoullessDemon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose 1 Strength.

theRetrospect:DefectiveEcho.NAME: Defective Echo
theRetrospect:DefectiveEcho.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Next turn, you first !M! card{!M!|>1=s} are played twice.
